title: High-performance hexaferrite magnets tailored through alignment of shape-controlled nanocomposites
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10790-10798
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA05634A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anna Zink Eikeland, Frederik Holm Gjørup, Henrik Lyder Andersen, Mogens Christensen
Nanocrystallites of strontium hexaferrite were prepared by autoclave and solid-salt-matrix synthesis and mixed in different ratios. The spark plasma sintered composite revealed enhanced magnetic properties.
